feed.title: WiSSAP 2023
feed.subtitle: WiSSAP 2023 is a summer school providing a didactic introduction to a range of modern topics in Machine Learning and their applications in other disciplines of Science, primarily intended for research-oriented graduate students. The school features a line-up of internationally recognized researchers who will talk with enthusiasm about their subjects. Our goal is to provide a unique opportunity to learn from and connect with the leading experts in the scenic setting of the historic city of Krak√≥w, Poland.
